original: 《 招募 》招募武將會參照目標武將的忠誠度、執行武將對目標武將的智力比、執行武將與目標武將是否有人際關係。如果能帶上對方喜歡的禮物那就更好了！
text: "Recruitment" The recruiting general will refer to the loyalty of the target general, the intelligence ratio of the executing general to the target general, and whether the executing general has a human relationship with the target general. It would be even better if you can bring gifts that the other party likes!
